NetworkDataCategory.name: NetworkDataCategory
NetworkDataCategory.description: Represents data categories in Lightning Web Runtime (LWR) Experience Cloud Sites.

DataCategoryGroupName.description: Name of the data category group that contains one or more data categories.

ImageId.description: Image associated with the data category.

Label.description: The name of the data category shown in the UI.

NetworkId.description: ID of the associated Experience site.

NetworkDataCategory.accessRules: This object is available only when your org has Digital Experiences and Knowledge or Service Catalog enabled.
